name: IMDB Top 1000
content:
Description: IMDB Dataset of top 1000 movies and tv shows.

[Source 1](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/harshitshankhdhar/imdb-dataset-of-top-1000-movies-and-tv-shows) [Source 2](https://www.imdb.com/)

Columns:

- Poster_Link (link) - Link of the poster that imdb using
- Series_Title (string)- Name of the movie
- Released_Year (number)- Year at which that movie released
- Certificate (string)- Certificate earned by that movie
- Runtime (number) - Total runtime of the movie
- Genre (string)- Genre of the movie
- IMDB_Rating(number) - Rating of the movie at IMDB site
- Overview (string)- mini story/ summary
- Meta_score (number) - Score earned by the movie
- Director (string)- Name of the Director
- Star1,Star2,Star3,Star4 (string)- Name of the Stars
- No of_votes (number) - Total number of votes
- Gross (string) - Money earned by that movie
